verses.verse: And <S%H120>Adam<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2332>Eve<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>; and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7014>Cain<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I have <S%H7069>gotten<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H854>from<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. Cain: that is, Gotten, or, Acquired

And she <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1893>Abel<s%>. And <S%H1893>Abel<s%> was a <S%H7462>keeper<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, but <S%H7014>Cain<s%> was a <S%H5647>tiller<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%>. Abel: Heb. Hebel a keeper: Heb. a feeder

And in <S%H7093>process<s%> of <S%H3117>time<s%> it came to pass, that <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. in process: Heb. at the end of days

And <S%H1893>Abel<s%>, <S%H1931>he<s%> also <S%H935>brought<s%> of the <S%H1062>firstlings<s%> of his <S%H6629>flock<s%> and of the <S%H2459>fat<s%> thereof. And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H8159>respect<s%> unto <S%H1893>Abel<s%> and to his <S%H4503>offering<s%>: flock: Heb. sheep, or, goats

But unto <S%H7014>Cain<s%> and to his <S%H4503>offering<s%> he had not <S%H8159>respect<s%>. And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>wroth<s%>, and his <S%H6440>countenance<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7014>Cain<s%>, Why art thou <S%H2734>wroth<s%>? and why is thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%>?

<S%H518>If<s%> thou doest <S%H3190>well<s%>, shalt thou not be <S%H7613>accepted<s%>? and if thou doest not <S%H3190>well<s%>, <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H7257>lieth<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%>. And unto thee shall be his <S%H8669>desire<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H4910>rule<s%> over him. be accepted: or, have the excellency unto: or, subject unto thee

And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H559>talked<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> <S%H1893>Abel<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>: and it came to pass, when they were in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, that <S%H7014>Cain<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1893>Abel<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and slew <S%H2026>him<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7014>Cain<s%>, <S%H335>Where<s%> is <S%H1893>Abel<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> not: Am I my <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H8104>keeper<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4100>What<s%> hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%>? the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thy <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H6817>crieth<s%> unto me from the <S%H127>ground<s%>. blood: Heb. bloods

And now art thou <S%H779>cursed<s%> from the <S%H127>earth<s%>, which hath <S%H6475>opened<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> thy <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> from thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>;

<S%H3588>When<s%> thou <S%H5647>tillest<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%>, it shall not <S%H3254>henceforth<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> unto thee her <S%H3581>strength<s%>; a <S%H5128>fugitive<s%> and a <S%H5110>vagabond<s%> shalt thou be in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, My <S%H5771>punishment<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> than I can <S%H5375>bear<s%>. My: or, Mine iniquity is greater than that it may be forgiven

Behold, thou hast driven me <S%H1644>out<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>; and <S%H5921>from<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> shall I be <S%H5641>hid<s%>; and I shall be a <S%H5128>fugitive<s%> and a <S%H5110>vagabond<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%>, that every one that findeth <S%H4672>me<s%> shall slay <S%H2026>me<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3651>Therefore<s%> whosoever <S%H2026>slayeth<s%> <S%H7014>Cain<s%>, vengeance shall be <S%H5358>taken<s%> on him <S%H7659>sevenfold<s%>. And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H226>mark<s%> upon <S%H7014>Cain<s%>, <S%H1115>lest<s%> any <S%H4672>finding<s%> him should <S%H5221>kill<s%> him.

And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5113>Nod<s%>, on the <S%H6926>east<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%>.

And <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>; and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H2585>Enoch<s%>: and he <S%H1129>builded<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H2585>Enoch<s%>. Enoch: Heb. Chanoch

And unto <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H5897>Irad<s%>: and <S%H5897>Irad<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H4232>Mehujael<s%>: and <S%H4232>Mehujael<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H4967>Methusael<s%>: and <S%H4967>Methusael<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3929>Lamech<s%>. Lamech: Heb. Lemech

And <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> unto him <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>: the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H5711>Adah<s%>, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6741>Zillah<s%>.
And <S%H5711>Adah<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H2989>Jabal<s%>: he was the <S%H1>father<s%> of such as <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%>, and of such as have <S%H4735>cattle<s%>.
And his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3106>Jubal<s%>: he was the <S%H1>father<s%> of all such as <S%H8610>handle<s%> the <S%H3658>harp<s%> and <S%H5748>organ<s%>.

And <S%H6741>Zillah<s%>, she also <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H8423>Tubalcain<s%>, an <S%H3913>instructer<s%> of every <S%H2794>artificer<s%> in <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%>: and the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H8423>Tubalcain<s%> was <S%H5279>Naamah<s%>. instructer: Heb. whetter

And <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H802>wives<s%>, <S%H5711>Adah<s%> and <S%H6741>Zillah<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>; ye <S%H802>wives<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech<s%>, <S%H238>hearken<s%> unto my <S%H565>speech<s%>: for I have <S%H2026>slain<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to my <S%H6482>wounding<s%>, and a young <S%H3206>man<s%> to my <S%H2250>hurt<s%>. I have: or, I would slay a man in my wound, etc to my hurt: or, in my hurt
<S%H3588>If<s%> <S%H7014>Cain<s%> shall be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold<s%>, truly <S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H7651>sevenfold<s%>.

And <S%H120>Adam<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%>; and she <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8352>Seth<s%>: For <S%H430>God<s%>, said she, hath <S%H7896>appointed<s%> me <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H1893>Abel<s%>, <S%H3588>whom<s%> <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%>. Seth: Heb. Sheth: that is Appointed, or, Put

And to <S%H8352>Seth<s%>, to <S%H1931>him<s%> also there was <S%H3205>born<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>; and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H583>Enos<s%>: then began <S%H2490>men<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. Enos: Heb. Enosh to call: or, to call themselves by the name of the Lord
